text: Ara lokedera madhye emana'o rayeche ye bale -- ''amara allah‌te imana enechi’’, kintu yakhana take allah‌ra pathe kasta de'oya haya takhana se lokadera utpiranake allah‌ra sasti bale jnana kare. Ara yadi tomara prabhura nikata theke kono sahayya ase tabe tara abasya'i balabe -- ''amara nihsandeha tomadera sathe chilama.’’ E ki naya ye allah‌i bhala janena ya kichu bisbabasira hrdaye rayeche
